amendment.description: An amendment numbered 17 printed in House Report 116-6 to expand the scope of services under which a veteran would qualify for free child care to include health care services provided as part of readjustment counseling.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Golden amendment (A017) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A017) offered by Mr. Golden.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Golden amendment (A017) Agreed to by voice vote.
